summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ukrainian CRM system for client management. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate), frontend functionality working well with minor UI issues. All core features functional including client CRUD, status management, statistics, filtering, and daily reports.

minor_bugs.issue: GET requests to non-existent resources return 405 instead of 404
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just HTTP status code inconsistency

minor_bugs.issue: GET requests to non-existent resources return 405 instead of 404
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just HTTP status code inconsistency

ui_bugs.issue: Color input field expects different format, causing 'Malformed value' error
ui_bugs.workaround: Status creation still works, just color selection has input format issue

console_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
Select switching from uncontrolled to controlled

action_item_for_E1: Fix minor color input format issue in status type management dialog. The input expects a specific color format that's causing a 'Malformed value' error. Also consider fixing HTTP status codes for non-existent resource GET requests (should return 404 instead of 405).
